import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../hooks/useAuth'; import { useLicense } from '../hooks/useLicense'; import InventoryManagement from './InventoryManagement'; import SuppliersManagement from './SuppliersManagement'; import LicenseManagement from './LicenseManagement'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { signOut, user } = useAuth(); const { isAdmin, getLicenseInfo } = useLicense(); const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const [sidebarCollapsed, setSidebarCollapsed] = useState(false); const [currentSection, setCurrentSection] = useState('Dashboard'); const licenseInfo = getLicenseInfo(); const handleLogout = async () => { try { const result = await signOut(); if (result.success) { navigate('/login'); } else { console.error('Error al cerrar sesión:', result.error); // Aún así redirigir al login navigate('/login'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error al cerrar sesión:', error); // Aún así redirigir al login navigate('/login'); } }; const getMenuItems = () => { const baseItems = [ { name: 'Dashboard', icon: 'M2.25 12l8.954-8.955c.44-.439 1.152-.439 1.591 0L21.75 12M4.5 9.75v10.125c0 .621.504 1.125 1.125 1.125H9.75v-4.875c0-.621.504-1.125 1.125-1.125h2.25c.621 0 1.125.504 1.125 1.125V21h4.125c.621 0 1.125-.504 1.125-1.125V9.75M8.25 21h8.25' }, { name: 'Gestión de Inventario', icon: 'M20.25 6.375c0 2.278-3.694 4.125-8.25 4.125S3.75 8.653 3.75 6.375m16.5 0c0-2.278-3.694-4.125-8.25-4.125S3.75 4.097 3.75 6.375m16.5 0v11.25c0 2.278-3.694 4.125-8.25 4.125s-8.25-1.847-8.25-4.125V6.375m16.5 0v3.75m-16.5-3.75v3.75m16.5 0v3.75C20.25 16.153 16.556 18 12 18s-8.25-1.847-8.25-4.125v-3.75m16.5 0c0 2.278-3.694 4.125-8.25 4.125s-8.25-1.847-8.25-4.125' }, { name: 'Proveedores', icon: 'M15.182 15.182a4.5 4.5 0 01-6.364 0M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0zM9.75 9.75c0 .414-.168.75-.375.75S9 10.164 9 9.75 9.168 9 9.375 9s.375.336.375.75zm-.375 0h.008v.015h-.008V9.75zm5.625 0c0 .414-.168.75-.375.75s-.375-.336-.375-.75.168-.75.375-.75.375.336.375.75zm-.375 0h.008v.015h-.008V9.75z' }, { name: 'Planificación de Menús', icon: 'M9 17.25v1.007a3 3 0 01-.879 2.122L7.5 21h9l-.621-.621A3 3 0 0115 18.257V17.25m6-12V15a2.25 2.25 0 01-2.25 2.25H5.25A2.25 2.25 0 013 15V5.25m18 0A2.25 2.25 0 0018.75 3H5.25A2.25 2.25 0 003 5.25m18 0V12a2.25 2.25 0 01-2.25 2.25H5.25A2.25 2.25 0 013 12V5.25' }, { name: 'Cálculo de Costos', icon: 'M12 6v12m-3-2.818l.879.659c1.171.879 3.07.879 4.242 0 1.172-.879 1.172-2.303 0-3.182C13.536 12.219 12.768 12 12 12c-.725 0-1.45-.22-2.003-.659-1.171-.879-1.172-2.303 0-3.182s3.07-.879 4.242 0l.415.33M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z' }, { name: 'Gestión de Recetas', icon: 'M9 12h3.75M9 15h3.75M9 18h3.75m3 .75H18a2.25 2.25 0 002.25-2.25V6.108c0-1.135-.845-2.098-1.976-2.192a48.424 48.424 0 00-1.123-.08m-5.801 0c-.065.21-.1.433-.1.664 0 .414.336.75.75.75h4.5a.75.75 0 00.75-.75 2.25 2.25 0 00-.1-.664m-5.8 0A2.251 2.251 0 0113.5 2.25H15c1.012 0 1.867.668 2.15 1.586m-5.8 0c-.376.023-.75.05-1.124.08C9.095 4.01 8.25 4.973 8.25 6.108V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 002.25 2.25h.75m-1.5-18h.008v.008H12V3.75zm0 0h.008v.008H12V3.75z' }, { name: 'Informes de Rendimiento', icon: 'M7.5 14.25v2.25m3-4.5v4.5m3-6.75v6.75m3-9v9M6 20.25h12A2.25 2.25 0 0020.25 18V6A2.25 2.25 0 0018 3.75H6A2.25 2.25 0 003.75 6v12A2.25 2.25 0 006 20.25z' } ]; // Agregar gestión de licencias solo para administradores if (isAdmin()) { baseItems.push({ name: 'Gestión de Licencias', icon: 'M9 12l2 2 4-4m6 2a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z' }); } return baseItems; }; const menuItems = getMenuItems(); const renderMenuItem = (item, isMobile = false) => ( ); const renderContent = () => { switch(currentSection) { case 'Gestión de Inventario': return ; case 'Proveedores': return ; case 'Gestión de Licencias': return ; case 'Dashboard': return (
{/* Información de Licencia */} {licenseInfo && (
Licencia: {licenseInfo.type === 'premium' ? 'Premium' : 'Gratuita'} {licenseInfo.isAdmin && ( Admin )} {licenseInfo.isActive ? ( licenseInfo.daysRemaining > 0 ? ( `Expira en ${licenseInfo.daysRemaining} días` ) : ( 'Expira hoy' ) ) : ( 'Expirada' )}
{licenseInfo.limits.ingredients} ingredientes • {licenseInfo.limits.suppliers} proveedores
)}
{/* Tarjeta de Inventario */}

Inventario

45

Productos en stock

+5% vs mes anterior
{/* Tarjeta de Menús Activos */}

Menús Activos

8

{/* Tarjeta de Recetas */}

Recetas

{/* Tarjeta de Costos */}

Costos Mensuales

-3% vs mes anterior
{/* Sección de Actividad Reciente */}

Actividad Reciente

Nueva receta agregada

Actualización de inventario

Tomates - 50 unidades - hace 4 horas

12:45 PM

Nuevo menú creado

Menú de Verano - hace 1 día

Ayer
); default: return null; } }; return (
{/* Mobile menu button */}

Gestor de Cocina

{/* Mobile sidebar */} {sidebarOpen && (
setSidebarOpen(false)} />

Gestor de Cocina

{menuItems.map(item => renderMenuItem(item, true))}
Gestor de Cocina
{licenseInfo ? ( `Licencia: ${licenseInfo.type === 'premium' ? 'Premium' : 'Gratuita'}` ) : ( 'Licencia: Usuario' )}
)} {/* Desktop sidebar */}

Gestor de Cocina

{menuItems.map(item => ( ))}
Gestor de Cocina
{licenseInfo ? ( `Licencia: ${licenseInfo.type === 'premium' ? 'Premium' : 'Gratuita'}` ) : ( 'Licencia: Usuario' )}
{/* Main content */}

{currentSection}

{renderContent()}
); }; export default Dashboard;
